trans-unit.source: Describes the serialization format for <xref:System.DateTime> columns in a <xref href="System.Data.DataSet"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 描述的序列化格式<xref:System.DateTime>中的列<xref href="System.Data.DataSet"> </xref>。</xref:System.DateTime>

trans-unit.source: DataSetDateTime cannot be set on non-<xref:System.DateTime> columns.
trans-unit.target: 无法在上设置 DataSetDateTime 非<xref:System.DateTime>列。</xref:System.DateTime>

trans-unit.source: Setting the <xref:System.Data.DataColumn.DateTimeMode%2A> property with the default value UnspecifiedLocall on non-<xref:System.DateTime> columns is permitted.
trans-unit.target: 设置<xref:System.Data.DataColumn.DateTimeMode%2A>属性上非默认值 UnspecifiedLocall<xref:System.DateTime>允许列。</xref:System.DateTime> </xref:System.Data.DataColumn.DateTimeMode%2A>

trans-unit.source: Modifying the column data type from <xref:System.DateTime> to any other type resets the <xref:System.Data.DataColumn.DateTimeMode%2A> to the default value UnspecifiedLocal.
trans-unit.target: 修改列数据类型从<xref:System.DateTime>为任何其他类型重置<xref:System.Data.DataColumn.DateTimeMode%2A>到默认值 UnspecifiedLocal。</xref:System.Data.DataColumn.DateTimeMode%2A> </xref:System.DateTime>

trans-unit.source: Checking schema for merging, Relations, and ForeignKeyConstraints can be performed between <xref:System.DateTime> columns with matching <xref:System.Data.DataColumn.DateTimeMode%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: 合并的架构，关系和 ForeignKeyConstraints 可以执行检查之间<xref:System.DateTime>列具有匹配<xref:System.Data.DataColumn.DateTimeMode%2A>属性。</xref:System.Data.DataColumn.DateTimeMode%2A> </xref:System.DateTime>

trans-unit.source: Otherwise the columns should be considered as non-matching on schema.
trans-unit.target: 否则应视为列架构不匹配。

trans-unit.source: The only exception is between Unspecified and UnspecifiedLocal.
trans-unit.target: 唯一的例外是未指定和 UnspecifiedLocal 之间。

trans-unit.source: It is permitted to have a relation or a `ForeignKeyConstraint` between two `DateTime` columns with one in `Unspecified` and other in `UnspecifiedLocal`<xref:System.Data.DataColumn.DateTimeMode%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 允许以具有关系或`ForeignKeyConstraint`之间两个`DateTime`具有一个中的列`Unspecified`和其他中`UnspecifiedLocal` <xref:System.Data.DataColumn.DateTimeMode%2A>.</xref:System.Data.DataColumn.DateTimeMode%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_DateTime" name="DateTime" href=""></xref> is always stored in Local.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_DateTime" name="DateTime" href=""></xref>始终会存储在本地。

trans-unit.source: If Utc or Unspecified is assigned to a column in this mode, it is first converted into Local.
trans-unit.target: 如果 Utc 或未指定分配到在此模式下的列，它将首先转换为本地。

trans-unit.source: Serialization in this mode is always performed in Local.
trans-unit.target: 在此模式下的序列化始终在本地执行。

trans-unit.source: There is an offset during serialization.
trans-unit.target: 在序列化过程没有偏移量。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 要添加。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_DateTime" name="DateTime" href=""></xref> is always stored in Unspecified.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_DateTime" name="DateTime" href=""></xref>始终会存储在未指定。

trans-unit.source: If Local or Utc is assigned to a column in this mode, it is first converted into Unspecified.
trans-unit.target: 如果本地还是根据 Utc 分配给此模式中的列，它将首先转换为未指定。

trans-unit.source: Serialization in this mode does not cause an offset.
trans-unit.target: 在此模式下的序列化不会导致偏移量。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 要添加。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_DateTime" name="DateTime" href=""></xref> is stored in Unspecified.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_DateTime" name="DateTime" href=""></xref>存储在未指定。

trans-unit.source: If Local or Utc is assigned to a column in this mode, it is first converted into Unspecified.
trans-unit.target: 如果本地还是根据 Utc 分配给此模式中的列，它将首先转换为未指定。

trans-unit.source: Serialization in this mode causes offset.
trans-unit.target: 在此模式下的序列化会导致偏移量。

trans-unit.source: This is the default behavior and is backward compatible.
trans-unit.target: 这是默认行为，并向后兼容。

trans-unit.source: This option should be thought of as being Unspecified in storage but applying an offset that is similar to Local during serialization.
trans-unit.target: 此选项应认为是为在未指定存储中的，但应用是在序列化过程类似于本地的偏移量。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 要添加。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_DateTime" name="DateTime" href=""></xref> is stored in Universal Coordinated Time (UTC).
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_DateTime" name="DateTime" href=""></xref>存储以协调世界时 (UTC)。

trans-unit.source: If Local or Unspecified is assigned to a column in this mode, it is first converted into <xref uid="langword_csharp_Utc" name="Utc" href=""></xref> format.
trans-unit.target: 如果本地或未指定分配到在此模式下的列，它将首先转换为<xref uid="langword_csharp_Utc" name="Utc" href=""></xref>格式。

trans-unit.source: Serialization in this mode is always performed in <xref uid="langword_csharp_Utc" name="Utc" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 在此模式下的序列化始终以执行<xref uid="langword_csharp_Utc" name="Utc" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: There is no offset during serialization.
trans-unit.target: 在序列化过程中没有未偏移量。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 要添加。
